body.name: RAKEBLUE 1080P Doorbell Camera Wireless, Video Doorbell with Chime,Cloud Storage,AI Motion Detection, Real time Arert,2-Way Audio, Night Vision, IP65
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 17 mins
features: Clear Infrared Night Vision : Doorbell camera full HD resolution combined with the ultra-wide-angle lens enables the doorbell to record clearly. It also performs equally well in night vision mode. The viewing distance is 16 feet in total darkness without light pollution.

Human Motion Detection & Two-Way Audio: Video doorbell recording can be activated as soon as human motion is detected. Quick alerts are also sent to your phone. The camera's built-in noise-cancelling microphone and speaker system provides two-way high-fidelity calls at all times.

Cloud Storage & Multi-User Sharing: Video doorbell wireless is combines security and convenience. Record and store all athletic activity for 1 months trial cloud storage. The device will automatically overwrite the previous file loop recording. You can also share accounts with your family, up to 7 users.

Rechargeable Battery & IP65 Waterproof: The video doorbell comes with 2 large capacity rechargeable batteries, each time the battery runs out, you can continue to use it when it is fully charged again, which is environmentally friendly and saves a lot of money. To ensure your protection lasts 24/7, we use an IP65 waterproof design.

Easy Installation & One Year Warranty: It only takes 5 minutes to connect to wifi via the app and install where you want. Easily set up your smart video doorbell. (Only 2.4G WiFi router is supported, 5GHZ is not supported).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Need help with product! Not working
reviews.reviewText: I need support please while installing the device, it supports only 2.4 and my modem supports both 2.4 and 5.0 GHz but the device fails to connect to WiFi! There is no way to ask question in the Amazon site! Sorry for leaving bad review of 2 stars! I will change it when the device works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this video doorbell as an inexpensive way to add some security to my home. I work night shift so my wife and kids are home without me on a night and I like to be able to keep an eye on things.This video doorbell is extremely easy to set up and use. The app gives you step by step instructions to get the camera set up and connected to your WiFi.Once you have the camera set up you can install it either with the self adhesive pad or the screws and plugs provided.The camera quality is excellent and on a night it’s very clear too. You can set up the notifications to alert you when there is movement which I have set up for between 23:00 and 07:00 and this feature work very well.Obviously it works as a normal doorbell too and you can plug in the chime into any USB outlet and this is perfect for us as we have USB ports in all of our main sockets.So to summarise this is a very good quality video doorbell that is cheap but good quality and works extremely well. I am delighted with this purchase and the added peace of mind I have now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I received everything I needed to set up and install the doorbell camera in a single package. The box included a detailed guide for installation and usage, along with all the necessary tools. The only thing I had to provide was a USB power adapter for the door chime.The process of charging, installing, and setting up the app was simple and straightforward. The doorbell chime is quite loud, ensuring that I never miss a notification.The app sends doorbell alerts and, if chosen, motion detection notifications to my phone. Additionally, it also sends notifications to my Xiaomi Band.Sharing the camera with my wife was a breeze once she downloaded the app on her phone.The picture and video quality are true HD, although sometimes the bright background can make it slightly less clear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product, nice camera quality and definitely feel better knowing that I have it installed on my door bell. I recommend to anyone looking to have a security door bell👍🏼
